name: hover-card
title: Hover Card
description: HoverCard Components A floating card that appears on hover to show rich content. Combines Popover's context/portal/positioning with Tooltip's hover/timer pattern. State management uses createContext/useContext for parent-child communication. Timer IDs are stored on DOM elements (dataset) to ensure they are shared across event handler closures after hydration. Features: - Hover to open with configurable delay (700ms default) - Close delay (300ms default) allows moving to content - ESC key to close - Portal to body for overflow clipping escape - Accessibility (aria-expanded, data-state)

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the hover card is open

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when open state should change

props.name: openDelay
props.description: Delay in ms before opening on hover.

props.name: closeDelay
props.description: Delay in ms before closing after mouse leave.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Whether to render child element as trigger
